Title: American Horror Story
Actors: Evan Peters (Season 4), Sarah Paulson  (Season 4), Jessica Lange  (Season 4), Kathy Bates (Season 4), Michael Chiklis, Emma Roberts (Season 4), Angela Bassett (Season 4), Finn Wittrock , Frances Conroy (Season 4), Denis O'Hare (Season 4), Jamie Brewer (Season 4), Neil Patrick Harris, Gabourey Sidibe (Season 4)
Plot: Both physical and psychological horrors affect a decomposing family, workers and residents of an insane asylum, a coven of witches, and a cast of circus freaks in this anthology series, focusing on the themes of infidelity, sanity, oppression, and discrimination.
